item.title: Binclock
item.description: CLI Binary clock. In repo you can find two versions: “Live” version. Refresh every second, build with ncurses. (In the picture) “Executable” version. Print current time once in stdout and exit. | | | < 8 | || || < 4 || || || < 2 || || || < 1 HH:MM:SS Links: GitHub
